channel.title: Please help me
channel.description: OK first of all i made so some weapons has their own emotion when attacking,walking etc.But when i hit with whip the animation plays too fast and doesnt mach with hit.I mean there must be about 2 secs break to play animation again.How do i do that? --- Second question is about anim too.For example i click on guard which is not near me and i start walking.When i walk to him i see i hit him but animation doesnt play until the walk anim stops.How do i make so the animations play together?

item.title: Please help me
item.dc:creator: @runaway runaway
item.description:
@runaway wrote:

OK first of all i made so some weapons has their own emotion when attacking,walking etc.But when i hit with whip the animation plays too fast and doesnt mach with hit.I mean there must be about 2 secs break to play animation again.How do i do that?

Second question is about anim too.For example i click on guard which is not near me and i start walking.When i walk to him i see i hit him but animation doesnt play until the walk anim stops.How do i make so the animations play together?

Read full topic
